title: Jack Kornfield - Transmission: Receiving the Living Wisdom of Sp
description:
How do we come to embody the wisdom of our greatest teachers? Through transmission, the multidimensional exchange of energy on the psychological and spiritual levels on which we relate. Jack Kornfield has for five decades walked the spiritual path as both student and teacher. Transmission brings us this celebrated author's personal insights to clarify, demystify, and illuminate a phenomenon that he considers a crucial factor on the journey to awakening. Reflecting on the guidance he received from such masters as the Dalai Lama, Dipa Ma, ChÃƒÂ¶gyam Trungpa Rinpoche, Ram Dass, and many others, Jack shares six all-new teaching sessions investigating what it might mean for modern people to engage in the student-teacher relationship.

Includes all MP3s, pdf guide, and cover artwork
